text: Gerd Friedrich Bollmann (28 September 1947 â€“ 17 September 2017) was a German politician. He was born in Wanne-Eickel, Herne. He was a member of the SPD. In the German Bundestag he was one of the top voted SPD members in Germany's national parliament, where he represant the Herne-Area. Bollmann died on September 17, 2017 at the age of 69.Trauer um Gerd Bollmann ==References== ==Other websites== * Website from Gerd Friedrich Bollmann * Biography by German Bundestag Category:1947 births Category:2017 deaths Category:German Protestants Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany Category:Politicians from North Rhine-Westphalia
